basic.description: This half-credit course will be offered to students who have completed ANAT-312* in their undergraduate studies in the Queen's Life Sciences Program.  Through a series of tutorials and seminars, the course will focus on the most up-to-date discoveries in three areas of neuroanatomy.  The areas reflect the expertise in the department.  Fall Term. L. MacKenzie EXCLUSION: ANAT-837*
basic.subject: BMED
basic.title: Advanced Topics in Neuroanatomy
